title: The Miracle on 34th Street (TV-1955) CHRISTMAS SPECIAL

sources.title: The Miracle on 34th Street (TV-1955) CHRISTMAS SPECIAL
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: This charming, curiosity from the Golden Age of Television is adapted from the iconic 1947 film starring Edmund Gwenn, Maureen O'Hara, John Payne, and of course NATALIE WOOD. 

Stars: Thomas Mitchell, Teresa Wright, Sandy Descher
Director: Robert Stevenson
Writers: George Seaton (screenplay), Valentine Davies (novel)

In Valentine Davies' beloved tale, a kindly old gentleman working as a department store Santa causes a commotion when he claims to be the real Kris Kringle. Forced to prove his sanity, he must convince a court judge that he actually is Santa Claus.
